## OmvFilterString.matchString() function

Check for a string against a filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function matchString(str: string, filterString: OmvFilterString): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | The string to check against a filter. |
|  filterString | [OmvFilterString](./harp-omv-datasource.omvfilterstring.md) | The filter containing the match condition. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the match condition is satisfied.
